channel.title: Hosting issue
channel.description: Ok well I cannot portfoward ( DON'T SAY I CAN, I KNOW WHY I CANNOT BUT I AM TO LAZY TO FIX IT ) And I DID lookup how to host a server with Hamachi but couldn't figure out how, so if somebody can show me or direct me to a TuT that would be GREAT!

item.title: Hosting issue

item.description:

using anything other then port forwarding takes alot of work tell me why you can port forward?

It really easy…much easier then doing himitce ( spelled wrong…) or whatever…
